resources.string: Leap into literacy with CVC word frog! This innovative educational app fosters the development of reading foundational skills, specifically phonological awareness. Freddy Frog is hungry for vowels, and he needs your help to identify the correct vowel flies to eat. Use the consonants and image provided to determine the missing vowel and corresponding short vowel sound for each of the CVC words presented. Hear the consonant and missing vowel sounds by tapping on the letters or blank space of the word shown. Choose the incorrect vowel and Freddy will spit the fly right back out. Choose the correct vowel and celebrate with Freddy as he enjoys his lunch, sends up stars, and sings your praises!\n \t\t\t\t\tTen exciting levels are sure to keep you hopping. Each level features faster flies and a shorter time allotment for choosing the correct vowel, thus promoting more automatic responses and deeper level learning. Each correct answer will earn you a star. Four correct answers are needed to advance but, beware an incorrect answer will cost you a star. Play your way into literacy for the 21st century with the CVC word frog educational app.
Do you want to exit the game?
This application is not licensed. Please purchase it from Android Market.
